lead_paragraph: Asafa Powell cruised to victory in the 100 meters and the Olympic champion LaShawn Merritt won the 400 at the World Athletics Final in Stuttgart, Germany. Powell won in 9.87 seconds, and Merritt nipped Jeremy Wariner by 0.01 to win the 400 in 44.50.
snippet: Asafa Powell cruised to victory in the 100 meters and the Olympic champion LaShawn Merritt won the 400 at the World Athletics Final in Stuttgart, Germany. Powell won in 9.87 seconds, and Merritt nipped Jeremy Wariner by 0.01 to win the 400 in 44.50.
